title: Ticket #3204: segfault in condor_status -any -pool
description:
Crash is not 100% reproducable, I've seen about 1 time in 10. here's the backtrace, reformatted to be a bit more readable. 

warning: no loadable sections found in added symbol-file system-supplied DSO at 0x7fff22de3000
Core was generated by `condor_status -any -pool glidein.chtc.wisc.edu'.
Program terminated with signal 11, Segmentation fault.
#0  0x00002b1440a86a0b in void std::__unguarded_linear_insert<
	__gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem**, std::vector<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*, std::allocator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*> > >,
	compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*,
	compat_classad::ClassAdListDoesNotDeleteAds::ClassAdComparator>
    (   __gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem**, std::vector<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*, std::allocator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*> > >,
	compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*,
	compat_classad::ClassAdListDoesNotDeleteAds::ClassAdComparator
    ) ()
   from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_9_0.so
(gdb) backtrace
#0  0x00002b1440a86a0b
   in void std::__unguarded_linear_insert<__gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem**, std::vector<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*, std::allocator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*> > >, compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*, compat_classad::ClassAdListDoesNotDeleteAds::ClassAdComparator>(__gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem**, std::vector<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*, std::allocator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*> > >, compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*, compat_classad::ClassAdListDoesNotDeleteAds::ClassAdComparator) ()
   from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_9_0.so
#1  0x00002b1440a86e99
   in void std::__final_insertion_sort<
	__gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem**, std::vector<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*, std::allocator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*> > >,
	compat_classad::ClassAdListDoesNotDeleteAds::ClassAdComparator>
   (    __gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem**, std::vector<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*, std::allocator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*> > >,
	__gnu_cxx::__normal_iterator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem**, std::vector<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*, std::allocator<compat_classad::ClassAdListItem*> > >,
	compat_classad::ClassAdListDoesNotDeleteAds::ClassAdComparator
   ) ()
   from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_9_0.so
#2  0x00002b1440a861d2
   in compat_classad::ClassAdListDoesNotDeleteAds::Sort(
	int (*)(compat_classad::ClassAd*, compat_classad::ClassAd*, void*),
	void*) ()
   from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_9_0.so
#3  0x0000000000409ffe
   in main ()
remarks:
2012-Aug-20 16:46:36 by johnkn:
this was not released 7.9.0. it was $CondorVersion: 7.9.0 Jul 10 2012 BuildID: 51900 $

2012-Aug-20 16:49:29 by johnkn:
valgrind --tool=memcheck condor_status -any -pool glidein.chtc.wisc.edu
